metadata.title: CVE-2022-26562 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in provider/libserver/ECKrbAuth.cpp of Kopano Core <= v11.0.2.51contains an issue which allows attackers to authenticate even if the useraccount or password is expired. It also exists in the predecessor ZarafaCollaboration Platform (ZCP) in provider/libserver/ECPamAuth.cpp of Zarafa>= 6.30 (introduced between 6.30.0 RC1e and 6.30.8 final).

criterions.comment: kopanocore package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
